page.title: 06Problems in OLD
page.content:
The only shop in Old is the Post Office run by the same lady for 36 years.It is very small,three customers making it crowded,and sells sweets.The main improvement requested by villagers is a shop for groceries.They have to travel to Kettering (10 miles) or Northampton (12 miles) for their main shopping.{Mobile shops},selling groceries,wet fish and fish & chips,provide an important service for those who find it difficult to shop in town.
Another complaint is the number of heavy {lorries}which go through the centre of the village.The villagers would like to see these banned due to the {noise}and the{dangers }produced by them.
